languages.text: "И это... истина. Я жажду знания, а Омниссия поощрил меня, даровав мне миссию искать его. Возможно, Его не интересует, принесет добытое мной знание пользу или вред. Он просто хочет, чтобы оно было добыто".

"That, too... is true. I thirst for knowledge, and the Omnissiah has rewarded me with the gift of a mission to seek it. Perhaps it makes no difference to Him whether good or ill comes of the knowledge I obtain. He merely wants me to obtain it."
languages.original_text: "И это... истина. Я жажду знания, а Омниссия поощрил меня, даровав мне миссию искать его. Возможно, Его не интересует, принесет добытое мной знание пользу или вред. Он просто хочет, чтобы оно было добыто".

traits.locale_text: "That, too... is true. I thirst for knowledge, and the Omnissiah has rewarded me with the gift of a mission to seek it. Perhaps it makes no difference to Him whether good or ill comes of the knowledge I obtain. He merely wants me to obtain it."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "That, too... is true. I thirst for knowledge, and the Omnissiah has rewarded me with the gift of a mission to seek it. Perhaps it makes no difference to Him whether good or ill comes of the knowledge I obtain. He merely wants me to obtain it."

traits.locale_text: "That, too... is true. I thirst for knowledge, and the Omnissiah has rewarded me with the gift of a mission to seek it. Perhaps it makes no difference to Him whether good or ill comes of the knowledge I obtain. He merely wants me to obtain it."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "That, too... is true. I thirst for knowledge, and the Omnissiah has rewarded me with the gift of a mission to seek it. Perhaps it makes no difference to Him whether good or ill comes of the knowledge I obtain. He merely wants me to obtain it."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “这种说法也……是正确的。我渴求知识，而欧姆尼塞亚赐予了我寻求知识的使命。或许对祂而言，我获得的知识是好是坏并没有区别，祂仅仅是想让我获得知识而已。”
languages.original_text: "That, too... is true. I thirst for knowledge, and the Omnissiah has rewarded me with the gift of a mission to seek it. Perhaps it makes no difference to Him whether good or ill comes of the knowledge I obtain. He merely wants me to obtain it."

traits.locale_text: “这种说法也……是正确的。我渴求知识，而欧姆尼塞亚赐予了我寻求知识的使命。或许对祂而言，我获得的知识是好是坏并没有区别，祂仅仅是想让我获得知识而已。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Eso, también... es cierto. Ansío el conocimiento y el Omnissiah me ha recompensado con la misión de buscarlo. Tal vez no le importe si las consecuencias de que lo obtenga sean buenas o malas. Solo quiere que lo obtenga».
languages.original_text: "That, too... is true. I thirst for knowledge, and the Omnissiah has rewarded me with the gift of a mission to seek it. Perhaps it makes no difference to Him whether good or ill comes of the knowledge I obtain. He merely wants me to obtain it."

traits.locale_text: «Eso, también... es cierto. Ansío el conocimiento y el Omnissiah me ha recompensado con la misión de buscarlo. Tal vez no le importe si las consecuencias de que lo obtenga sean buenas o malas. Solo quiere que lo obtenga».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「それも…真実だ。自分は知識を渇望しており、万機神はそれを求める使命という賜物を自分に与えてくださった。おそらく、自分が得た知識が善であろうと悪であろうと、主にとっては違いはない。私が知識を得ることを望んでおられるだけなのだ」
languages.original_text: "That, too... is true. I thirst for knowledge, and the Omnissiah has rewarded me with the gift of a mission to seek it. Perhaps it makes no difference to Him whether good or ill comes of the knowledge I obtain. He merely wants me to obtain it."

traits.locale_text: 「それも…真実だ。自分は知識を渇望しており、万機神はそれを求める使命という賜物を自分に与えてくださった。おそらく、自分が得た知識が善であろうと悪であろうと、主にとっては違いはない。私が知識を得ることを望んでおられるだけなのだ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Auch das ... ist wahr. Ich dürste nach Wissen, und der Omnissiah hat mir die Mission geschenkt, danach suchen zu dürfen. Vielleicht macht es für ihn keinen Unterschied, ob aus dem von mir erlangten Wissen Gutes oder Böses erwächst. Er möchte lediglich, dass ich es erlange."
languages.original_text: "That, too... is true. I thirst for knowledge, and the Omnissiah has rewarded me with the gift of a mission to seek it. Perhaps it makes no difference to Him whether good or ill comes of the knowledge I obtain. He merely wants me to obtain it."

traits.locale_text: "Auch das ... ist wahr. Ich dürste nach Wissen, und der Omnissiah hat mir die Mission geschenkt, danach suchen zu dürfen. Vielleicht macht es für ihn keinen Unterschied, ob aus dem von mir erlangten Wissen Gutes oder Böses erwächst. Er möchte lediglich, dass ich es erlange."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « À nouveau... vous dites vrai. J'ai soif de connaissances, et l'Omnimessie m'a récompensé en me chargeant d'en chercher toujours plus. Il est possible que les conséquences de mes découvertes, bonnes ou mauvaises, Lui importent peu ; Il tient simplement à ce qu'elles soient faites. »
languages.original_text: "That, too... is true. I thirst for knowledge, and the Omnissiah has rewarded me with the gift of a mission to seek it. Perhaps it makes no difference to Him whether good or ill comes of the knowledge I obtain. He merely wants me to obtain it."

traits.locale_text: « À nouveau... vous dites vrai. J'ai soif de connaissances, et l'Omnimessie m'a récompensé en me chargeant d'en chercher toujours plus. Il est possible que les conséquences de mes découvertes, bonnes ou mauvaises, Lui importent peu ; Il tient simplement à ce qu'elles soient faites. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "That, too... is true. I thirst for knowledge, and the Omnissiah has rewarded me with the gift of a mission to seek it. Perhaps it makes no difference to Him whether good or ill comes of the knowledge I obtain. He merely wants me to obtain it."

languages.text: "Bu da... Doğru. İrfana açım. Hermesih de bana, onu arayabileceğim bir misyon armağan etti. Belki de elde ettiğim irfanın iyiye mi yoksa kötüye mi kullanılacağı O'nun için bir fark yaratmıyordur. O yalnızca bu irfanı elde etmemi istiyordur."
languages.original_text: "That, too... is true. I thirst for knowledge, and the Omnissiah has rewarded me with the gift of a mission to seek it. Perhaps it makes no difference to Him whether good or ill comes of the knowledge I obtain. He merely wants me to obtain it."

traits.locale_text: "Bu... Da doğru. İrfana açımdır ve Hermesih bana, onu arayabileceğim bir misyon armağan etti. Belki de elde ettiğim irfanın iyiye mi yoksa kötüye mi kullanılacağı O'nun için bir fark yaratmıyordur. O yalnızca bu irfanı elde etmemi istiyordur."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
